task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 12°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: To estimate the height of the building, I should look up to see the top of the structure and assess its full height.
I have looked up and can see the top of the building; now I should move closer to better estimate its height.
I am closer now but still need a better view of the building's base to accurately estimate its height.
I can now see the base of the building, which allows me to estimate the total height from ground to roof.
